title: Compute parameters for orange mint candies

content.question: Ten percent of all Dynamite Mints candies are orange and 45 percent of all Holiday Mints candies are orange. Two independent random samples, each of size 25, are selected - one from Dynamite Mints candies and the other from Holiday Mints candies. The total number of orange candies in the two samples is observed. What are the expected total number of orange candies and the standard deviation for the total number of orange candies, respectively, in the two samples?

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
